item.title: Minimum weight error correction in the surface code
item.description: I’ve gotten a little confused by different terminologies and complexities involved in correcting errors in the surface code so I’ve rewritten the MWPM-involving algorithm to better understand it. A good reference (with fast accompanying library) is 1. Picture the surface code. Consider the following procedure to estimate the error in a given word. Generate the parity check matrix H for one of the operators (X-type or Z-type) over mod 2.
